title: 求大神看看两条指令有什么问题，还有正确生成村民的指令模板
author: Time_start
txt_content:
/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~
　　{CustomName:"珍妮",CustomNameVisible:1,Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:999999,buy:
　　{id:"minecraft:diamond",Count:5b},sell:{id:"minecraft:end_portal_farme",Count:1b},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:"minecraft:iron",Count:10b},sell:{id:"minecraft:lava_bucket",Count:1b},
　　{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:"minecraft:iron",Count:10b},sell:{id:"minecraft:water_bucket",Count:1b},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:"minecraft:emerald",Count:1b},sell:{id:"minecraft:obsidian",Count:2b},
　　{maxUses:999999,buy:{id:"minecraft:diamond",Count:1b},sell:{id:"minecraft:sand",Count:20b},
{maxUses:1,buy:{id:"minecraft:bedrock",Count:1b},sell:{id:"minecraft:bedrock",Count:1b}]}}


/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~
　　{CustomName:"威廉斯",CustomNameVisible:1,Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:999999,buy:
　　{id:"minecraft:dirt",Count:10b},sell:{id:"minecraft:cobblestone",Count:1b},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:"minecraft:stone",Count:20b},sell:{id:"minecraft:iron_block",Count:2b},
　　{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:"minecraft:iron_block",Count:2b},sell:{id:"minecraft:gold_block",Count:1b},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:"minecraft:gold_block",Count:3b},sell:{id:"minecraft:diamond_block",Count:1b},
　　{maxUses:999999,buy:{id:"minecraft:diamond_block",Count:1b},sell:{id:"minecraft:coal",Count:10b},
{maxUses:1,buy:{id:"minecraft:bedrock",Count:1b},sell:{id:"minecraft:bedrock",Count:1b}]}}

就是他两！！！！

replies.author: 阿斯顿大法
replies.txt_content:
/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:珍妮,CustomNameVisible:1,Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:999999,buy:{id:diamond,Count:5b},sell:{id:end_portal_frame,Count:1b}},{maxUses:999999,buy:{id:iron_ingot,Count:10b},sell:{id:lava_bucket,Count:1b}},{maxUses:999999,buy:{id:iron_ingot,Count:10b},sell:{id:water_bucket,Count:1b}},{maxUses:999999,buy:{id:emerald,Count:1b},sell:{id:obsidian,Count:2b}},{maxUses:999999,buy:{id:diamond,Count:1b},sell:{id:sand,Count:20b}},{maxUses:999999,buy:{id:bedrock,Count:1b},sell:{id:bedrock,Count:1b}}]}}
<DIV class=blockcode>
<BLOCKQUOTE>/summon Villager ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"威廉斯",CustomNameVisible:1,Offers:{Recipes:[{maxUses:999999,buy:{id:"minecraft:dirt",Count:10b},sell:{id:"minecraft:cobblestone",Count:1b}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:"minecraft:stone",Count:20b},sell:{id:"minecraft:iron_block",Count:2b}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:"minecraft:iron_block",Count:2b},sell:{id:"minecraft:gold_block",Count:1b}},{maxUses:9999999,buy:{id:"minecraft:gold_block",Count:3b},sell:{id:"minecraft:diamond_block",Count:1b}},{maxUses:999999,buy:{id:"minecraft:diamond_block",Count:1b},sell:{id:"minecraft:coal",Count:10b}},{maxUses:1,buy:{id:"minecraft:bedrock",Count:1b},sell:{id:"minecraft:bedrock",Count:1b}}]}}复制代码
修复后的

replies.author: jxudvv
replies.txt_content:
所有sell后面都缺个花括号
以后建议你用记事本写指令，而且打括号的时候一对一对打
应该是{maxUses:xxx,buy:{xxx},sell:{xxx}}，你在sell的后面少一个花括号
